Ugong, Pasig City, Metro Manila | opening_date = August 19, 2006 | developer = [[SM Prime Holdings]] | manager = [[SM Prime Holdings]] | owner = [[Henry Sy|Henry Sy, Sr.]] | land_area = 20,080 mÂ² | floor_area = 29,017.12 mÂ² | floors = 1 + basement for carpark |website = [http://smsupermalls.com/smsupermalls/index.php?p=651&mall=31 SM Center Pasig Official Website] }} [[File:SM Pasig Mall Facade.jpg|thumb|SM Center Pasig]] '''SM Center Pasig''', formerly called '''SM Supercenter Pasig''', is a mall owned and developed by [[SM Prime Holdings]]. Opened on August 19, 2006, this is the smallest SM Supermall to date. The mall is located at E. Rodriguez, Jr. Ave. (C5) corner DoÃ±a Julia Vargas Ave., Frontera Verde, Ortigas Center, Brgy. Ugong, [[Pasig]] City near [[Tiendesitas]]. With a floor area of 30,000 square meters, it only features the SM Hypermarket, Ace Hardware, Watsons, Quantum and several small shops and dining establishments. This became the first SM Supermall to have no cinemas. ==Anchors== *SM Hypermarket *Ace Hardware *Watsons ==References== {{reflist}} ==External links== *[http://www.smdeptstore.com/ SM Department Stores].
